mapper.insert: insert into user (login_id, password, nickname, name, email, phone_number, check_admin) values (#{login_id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone_number}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT login_id from user WHERE name=#{name} and email=#{email}
SELECT password from user WHERE login_id=#{login_id} and email=#{email}
SELECT count(*) from user WHERE login_id=#{login_id}
SELECT count(*) from user WHERE nickname=#{nickname}
SELECT count(*) from user WHERE email=#{email}
